titleStmt.title: Edwin F. Corey to James F. Robinson
CWG7976

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
New York May 4. 1863
His Excellency
James F Robinson
Dr Sir.

I most respectfully Solicit from you the appointment of Commissioner for Deeds from Kentucky I have held the Position for a number of years, and during the Rebellion being engaged In other matters my Commission ran out by expiration.

By grantting the same
You oblige
Your obt Srvt
Edwin F. Corey

New York
Comr of Deeds
Ed. F. Corey
City
Com. Issd May 21. 1863.
